summary: This is an FBI National Threat Operations Center (NTOC) Threat Intake Examiner (TIE) report forwarding information received from a caller on July 23, 2021. The caller, who identified as a former assistant to Ghislaine Maxwell, reported having information about a Maxwell associate and requested contact from the FBI, having also contacted attorney Gloria Allred.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The document is about a caller reporting information regarding a Ghislaine Maxwell associate; the caller identified as Maxwell's former assistant.

persons.name: Gloria Allred
persons.context: The caller reported having also contacted attorney Gloria Allred.

connections.description: The caller, who was Maxwell's former assistant, has contacted attorney Gloria Allred, suggesting a potential legal or informational connection.

events.title: Caller reports information to FBI NTOC
events.description: An individual, identifying as a former assistant to Ghislaine Maxwell, called the FBI National Threat Operations Center to report information regarding a Maxwell associate and requested FBI contact.

keyFacts: On July 23, 2021, a caller identifying as a former assistant to Ghislaine Maxwell contacted the FBI NTOC to report information about a Maxwell associate.
The caller lived with the associate in Los Angeles when working for Maxwell.
The caller did not want to provide details over the phone and requested direct contact from the FBI.
The caller had also contacted attorney Gloria Allred and had emailed an individual whose contact information they located.
